attributes.action: To give the postmaster who was removed from his job by asking people to learn to speak English his job back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He was just using common sense to ask people to either get hold of an interpreter or to learn some english. It was not offensive. He should have his old job back.

rejection.details: Please contact the Post Office with your concerns.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
